content.question: The government of the Articles of Confederation was successful in resolving the problem of how to

choices.label: open British Caribbean ports to American trade
enable American citizens to trade through the port of New Orleans
overcome state-imposed tariff barriers to interstate commerce
provide for statehood for western territories
secure sufficient funds for payment of the national debt

content.answer: provide for statehood for western territories

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
